content:
Currently, MD-PhD (Neurosciences) student in Aix Marseille University. I’m working on Neuroimaging, neuroinformatics and Machine and Deep Learning as researcher. I recently worked on neurological chronic symptoms and imaging aspects of Sars-Cov-2.
Using many tools :
 Clinica, AramisLab Freesurfer 6 R, Python TensorFlow, Pytorch  Also skilled as web developper using :
 Heroku, Azure, AWS and OVH Github, Bitbucket, Gitlab VueJS, JQuery, MDB Bootstrap, Element PHP, Laravel, SailsJS Wordpress, Drupal, Prestashop
summary: Currently, MD-PhD (Neurosciences) student in Aix Marseille University. I’m working on Neuroimaging, neuroinformatics and Machine and Deep Learning as researcher. I recently worked on neurological chronic symptoms and imaging aspects of Sars-Cov-2.
title: Jacques-Yves Campion
Introduction to AI applied to 3D neuroimaging medical field
